Cafe de Olla


Ingredients
4 cups water
1/3 grated piloncillo
1 stick cinnamon
1/4 cup coffee

Cooking Instructions

Place water, piloncillo, and cinnamon in a pot. Bring to a
boil, reduce heat, and simmer for 8 minutes. Remove from
heat, add coffee, and stir well. Cover pot and steep for 5
minutes. Pour through a fine mesh strainer twice or until
free of any coffee granules.
